CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How much the media will appear.
CONTROLS.NAME: media_color

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mix in rainbow color
CONTROLS.NAME: rainbow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION:
How strong the specular light is.
The specular light color is the complement of the object's color.
CONTROLS.NAME: specular_strength

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: base color, this color's complement will be calculated automatically
CONTROLS.NAME: base_color

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION:
ON: Apply black stripes to the scene color that move on drum beat.
OFF: No stripes for you.
CONTROLS.NAME: beat_stripe

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION:
Toggle media coloring mode.
OFF: Media is mapped to the uv coordinates of the screen. The geometry revels the media.
ON: Media is mapped to surface of the geomerty/
CONTROLS.NAME: media_uv_or_3d

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Smoothly apply a left vertical mirror.
CONTROLS.NAME: l_vert_mirr_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Smoothly apply a horizontal mirror.
CONTROLS.NAME: hor_mirr_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Smoothly ix between Left and Right vertical mirrors on beat detected.
CONTROLS.NAME: audio_mir

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: turn on feedback
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_on

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: zoom on beat
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: direction that the feedback zooms.
CONTROLS.NAME: zoom_direction

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How much the feedback fades. Lower values retain feedback for longer.
CONTROLS.NAME: fb_fade

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Number of spires present.
CONTROLS.NAME: spire_count

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Randomize the amount of spires on beat detected.
CONTROLS.NAME: rand_spire_count

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: ON: time variable is influenced by the audio bass. OFF: constant rate.
CONTROLS.NAME: geo_reactive_time

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How fast the time variable for the geometry grows, whether it is reactive time or constant time.
CONTROLS.NAME: geo_rate

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Field of View for the perspective of the camera
CONTROLS.NAME: FOV

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Smoothly distort the camera.
CONTROLS.NAME: cam_morph

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Place the camera in the helix tube.
CONTROLS.NAME: in_da_tube

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Switch between in da tube and out da tube on beat detected.
CONTROLS.NAME: rand_mode

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: ON: time variable is influenced by the audio bass. OFF: constant rate.
CONTROLS.NAME: reactive_time

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How fast the time variable grows, whether it is reactive time or constant time.
CONTROLS.NAME: spin_rate
